name: cryptochat
description: The Secure Chat Application is a web-based chat application that ensures end-to-end encryption, meaning that the server does not have access to any messages exchanged between clients. This is achieved using asymmetric RSA encryption, where each client generates a pair of cryptographic keys: a public key for encryption and a private key for decryption. The backend server is implemented using Spring Boot with WebSocket, serving solely as a mediator for message transmission.
